answer:
The "营改增" reform has achieved the following specific results: 
- For enterprises, it has reduced the local tax and fees by 180 billion yuan in a year.
- It has implemented the reform to support small and micro-enterprises with tax incentives.
- It has streamlined and standardized the fees and funds related to enterprises.
- It has actively promoted enterprise debt-to-equity swaps.
- It has encouraged enterprises to seek multiple channels for direct financing.
